price: Mi mu na Pravi put ukazujemo, pa ili je zahvalan ili nezahvalan.
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā hadaynāhu al-sabīla immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran
